name: Pepo (Amby)
description:
A very small game done as a Halloween challenge. Help Pepo escape the mysterious palace he woke up in.

  • Arrow keys (Left stick) = Move
  • Spacebar (A button) = Jump
  • P Key (X button) = Kick

Coincidentally, this is my first game so let me know what you think of it!

If you are interested in my future games and art consider joining my discord: https://discord.gg/ur5F2cJYSx
